name: Titan Labs
description:
Welcome to Titan Labs, a center for technological development and advanced scientific pursuits.

Or at least it was, many years ago. Now it lays abandoned and deteriorating. The cryogenic pods in the Cloning section are still intact, and this is where we begin our story.

Because one of the clones has just been awakened.

A mini metroidvania created for Metroidvania Month 8.
